mapper.select: SELECT SU.* FROM PDSCI.SYS_USER SU,PDSCI.SYS_USER_ROLE SUR,PDSCI.SYS_USER_DEPT SUD WHERE SU.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND SUR.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND SUD.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND SU.USER_FLOW = SUD.USER_FLOW AND SUD.DEPT_FLOW = #{deptFlow} AND SU.USER_FLOW = SUR.USER_FLOW AND SUR.ROLE_FLOW = #{roleFlow}
